description:
Phosphophyllite, Phos for short, is one of the weaker jewel people, with a hardness of 3.5. Declared as too weak for battle, Phos is tasked with creating an encyclopedia logging new information. As Phos keeps experiencing hardships in battle, their limbs, along with their memories, are gradually lost and replaced with other elements, including agate legs and arms made from gold and platinum alloy.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Phosphophyllite
